label: CROSS COUNTRY RUNNERS BARRED FROM S. A. RACE

resource.chars:
CROSS COUNTRY RUNNERS
BARRED FROM S. A. RACE

Maryland's cross country team,
champion for the past two years,
did not compete in the South At
lantic A. A. U. title race in Balti-
more last Saturday, Hie Old Liners
being declared ineligible because
they were not members of the
T'nion.
William Agee, who won the in-
dividual honors last year when the
race was held at College Park, re-
peated, traveling the (i 1-2 mile
snow-covered course in 4 0 minutes
5 4-fÂ» seconds.
Emory A. C., of which Agee is a
member won t lie team trophy, plac-
ing other men ninth, twelfth, six-
teenth and seventeenth. Apparently
it would have been easy picking for
Maryland to have taken the team
honors.
U. of M.
